title: The Implication of management control in the purchasing area of XYZ Company
abstract: Continuous review and improvement in operating units is a crucial factor for a multinational company in order to be more competitive. This operating unit is trying to improve their purchasing performance by having some inspection. The inspection is a way to control the implementation of organization standard. The method of inspection is by interviewing the related persons. Another tool that can improves the performance of the purchasing department is electronic data interchange. By using EDI, it will bring a positive change for business conducted between purchasers and suppliers for the future. Companies and suppliers are operating more practically in a real time environment can reduce total cost of purchases and communication can be more accurate and efficient. There are some surveys about ED1 conducted in America and Canada, case studies and also the real implementation in Indonesia. Therefore, the implementation of EDI in this operating unit should be considered.
